docblock.description: The name of the table for
The max length of the field
Boolean attr defines if the field can be leaved null
Boolean attr defines if the field is primary key in the table
Boolean attr defines if the field is unique key in the table
Boolean attr defines if the field is multiple key in the table
Boolean attr defines if the field is numeric
Boolean attr defines if the field is a blob
This attr defines if the integer field will have sing (for ex.
This attr defines if the integer field will be zerofilled (For ex.

docblock.description: If the query is for data fetching, yo must pass 1 in the construct method Else pass 0
This method run mysql_fetch_object and return an array with the rows
This function run mysql_fetch_field recursively and return an array with the fields in objects
This function fetch only one row of the query
This function creates a html table based on a fetched array
